name.th: ประวัติคลิปบอร์ด

short.de: Zeigt den Verlauf der Zwischenablage an
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Easily manage clipboard history. Copy, paste, and access recent items. Never lose important text.Boost productivity for multitaskers
short.ja: クリップボード履歴を簡単に管理。コピー、貼り付け、最近のアイテムにアクセス。重要なテキストを失わず、マルチタスカーの生産性を向上。
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Mostra o histórico da área de transferência
short.ro: Mostra o história da área de transferência
short.sl,sr,sv,sw: Inaonyesha historia ya ubao wa kunakili
short.th: แสดงประวัติคลิปบอร์ด
short.vi: Quản lý lịch sử clipboard. Sao chép, dán và truy cập mục gần đây. Bảo vệ văn bản quan trọng. Tăng hiệu suất làm việc.
short.zh_CN: 轻松管理剪贴板历史。复制、粘贴并访问最近项目。永不丢失重要文本。提高多任务处理者的工作效率。
short.zh_TW: 輕鬆管理剪貼簿歷史。複製、粘貼並訪問最近項目。永不丢失重要文本。提高多任務處理者的工作效率。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Intelligent Clipboard History Manager

Your ultimate clipboard assistant, making copy and paste more efficient and secure!

## Key Features:

1. Automatic Clipboard History Saving
   - Real-time recording of all text content you copy
   - Everything happens automatically in the background, no manual operation required

2. Quick Search and Retrieval
   - Powerful search function to easily find any previously copied content
   - Supports fuzzy search, helping you quickly locate needed information

3. One-Click Copy
   - Click to recopy content from history to clipboard
   - Eliminates the hassle of repeated input, improving work efficiency

4. Pin Important Content
   - Pin frequently used or important clipboard content for easy access
   - Quickly access your most needed information anytime

5. Clean and Intuitive Interface
   - Clear list display of all clipboard history
   - Each record shows text preview and creation time

6. Privacy Protection and Data Security
   - All data is stored on your local device, never uploaded to the cloud
   - You have full control over your data, ensuring the highest level of privacy and security
   - Support for manual deletion of individual or all history records

## How to Use:

1. After installation, the plugin runs automatically in the background, recording your clipboard history
2. Click the plugin icon in the browser toolbar to open the main interface
3. Enter keywords in the search box to quickly find specific content
4. Click on items in the list to copy them to the clipboard
5. Use features like pinning and deleting to manage your clipboard history

## Data Security Commitment:

We highly value your privacy and data security. This plugin uses local storage technology, and all clipboard history records are saved only on your device. We do not collect, transmit, or store any of your personal data. You can use it with complete peace of mind, enjoying convenience while ensuring absolute data security.

This plugin is your reliable assistant for daily work and study, making your copy and paste experience smoother, more efficient, and secure!

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at: cameronchen01@gmail.com

Install now and experience intelligent and secure clipboard management!
long.zh_CN:
智能剪贴板历史管理器

您的终极剪贴板助手,让复制粘贴变得更加高效且安全!

## 主要功能:

1. 自动保存剪贴板历史
   - 实时记录您复制的所有文本内容
   - 无需手动操作,一切都在后台自动进行

2. 快速搜索和检索
   - 强大的搜索功能,轻松找到之前复制的任何内容
   - 支持模糊搜索,帮您快速定位所需信息

3. 一键复制
   - 点击即可将历史记录中的内容重新复制到剪贴板
   - 省去重复输入的烦恼,提高工作效率

4. 置顶重要内容  
   - 将常用或重要的剪贴内容置顶显示
   - 随时快速访问您最需要的信息

5. 简洁直观的界面
   - 清晰列表展示所有剪贴历史
   - 每条记录显示文本预览和创建时间

6. 隐私保护和数据安全
   - 所有数据均存储在您的本地设备上,不会上传到云端
   - 您完全掌控自己的数据,确保最高级别的隐私和安全
   - 支持手动删除单条或清空所有历史记录

## 使用方法:

1. 安装插件后,它会自动在后台运行,记录您的剪贴板历史
2. 点击浏览器工具栏中的插件图标,打开主界面
3. 在搜索框中输入关键词,快速查找特定内容
4. 点击列表中的项目即可将其复制到剪贴板
5. 使用置顶、删除等功能管理您的剪贴历史

## 数据安全承诺:

我们高度重视您的隐私和数据安全。本插件采用本地存储技术,所有剪贴板历史记录都只保存在您的设备上。我们不会收集、传输或存储您的任何个人数据。您可以完全放心使用,享受便捷的同时,也确保了数据的绝对安全。

这款插件是您日常工作和学习的得力助手,让您的复制粘贴体验更加流畅、高效且安全!

如有任何问题或建议,欢迎联系我们: cameronchen01@gmail.com

立即安装,体验智能且安全的剪贴板管理!
